name: A.i.Sentinel
description: You guest it, a multilevel A.i. hunt down game! Search and destroy all the "A.i.Targets" before they bleach your armor, that is the game objective. In this version you won't find anything fancy and mentally strenuous like codes or puzzles to decipher. Just a good old semi-auto locked and loaded with an endless supply of led to squirt around... Until everything resembles Beirut, have fun! [;~]
